title: Lil Ark Angel
description: Child star Darla Dimple stars in this musical take on Noah’s Ark.
quote: I built a little boat as cute as it can be, and I put all the animals two-by-two in my little boat on the sea.
altHero: Darla Dimple, a young girl with golden curly hair, is dressed as an angel and approaches a pink and blue set depicting Noah’s ark
alt1: the angel stands on a building as huge tidal waves roll in
alt2: the angel dances and sings above waves as two unicorns look on concerned
alt3: the angel sits on a bull’s head
alt4: the angel swings on an anchor toward two cats
